alert.note: Alert for Coastal Volusia; Inland Northern Brevard; Inland Volusia; Mainland Northern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Orange; Seminole (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 08 at 5:45PM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Squalls will impact portions of Seminole, northwestern Brevard, east central Orange and eastern Volusia Counties through 645 PM EST... At 543 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking squalls over portions of Volusia and Seminole county, or near Deltona, moving southwest at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Deltona, Daytona Beach, Port Orange, Sanford and Titusville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with the passing squalls and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Volusia; Inland Northern Brevard; Inland Volusia; Mainland Northern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Orange; Seminole
